title: Wine 9.4 Released with Initial OpenGL Wayland Support
description:
Wine 9.4 debuts with vkd3d 1.11, Wayland driver OpenGL, elevated privileges, HID enhancements, and bug fixes. Here’s more on that!

The post Wine 9.4 Released with Initial OpenGL Wayland Support appeared first on Linux Today.

title: How to Create a Wifi Hotspot in Ubuntu
description:
Wi-Fi hotspots are a vital part of every on-the-go networking setup. Learn how you can create your own Wi-Fi hotspot on Ubuntu today in this tutorial.

The post How to Create a Wifi Hotspot in Ubuntu appeared first on Linux Today.

title: How to Install Monit on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS
description:
Monit is a small open-source utility for managing and monitoring Unix systems. This guide demonstrates how to install Monit on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS Jammy Jellyfish, utilizing the command-line terminal.

The post How to Install Monit on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS appeared first on Linux Today.
